title: Calories in 1 Tsp Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in tsp sugar, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per teaspoon, plus variations and FAQs.
assumptions: Granulated white table sugar; 1 tsp ≈4 g; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, brand, packing density, and measurement accuracy. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of granulated sugar contains about 16 kcal, all from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tsp of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 16 kcal per teaspoon of granulated sugar.
Yes, 1 tsp sugar is 4 g carbs, all from sugars, with 0 g protein or fat.

faqs.q: How does brown sugar compare to white?
faqs.a: Similar calories (≈16 kcal per tsp), but brown has trace fiber and molasses flavor.

faqs.q: What about sugar in coffee or tea?
faqs.a: Adds 16 kcal per tsp; total depends on other ingredients like milk.

faqs.q: Does sugar type affect calories much?
faqs.a: Minimal difference—honey or agave may add 5–10 kcal per tsp due to density.
